forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 10C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 51F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
